51 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
70 PatchKernel::PatchKernel(MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert)
71 #else
77 PatchKernel::PatchKernel(bool expert)
78 #endif
79  : m_expert(expert)
80 {
81  // Initialize the patch
82 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
83  initialize(communicator, haloSize);
84 #else
85  initialize();
86 #endif
87 
88  // Register the patch
89  patch::manager().registerPatch(this);
90 }

133 
134  // Set the dimension

138 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
159 PatchKernel::PatchKernel(int id, int dimension, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert)
160 #else
168 PatchKernel::PatchKernel(int id, int dimension, bool expert)
169 #endif
170  : m_expert(expert)
171 {
172  // Initialize the patch
173 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
174  initialize(communicator, haloSize);
175 #else
176  initialize();
177 #endif
178 
179  // Register the patch
180  patch::manager().registerPatch(this, id);
181 
182  // Set the dimension
183  //
184  // Here we can only call the base function, if needed, every derived patch
185  // has to call its derived function.
186  PatchKernel::setDimension(dimension);
187 }
188 
194 PatchKernel::PatchKernel(const PatchKernel &other)
195  : VTKBaseStreamer(other),
196  m_vertices(other.m_vertices),
197  m_cells(other.m_cells),
198  m_interfaces(other.m_interfaces),
199  m_alteredCells(other.m_alteredCells),
200  m_alteredInterfaces(other.m_alteredInterfaces),
201  m_vertexIdGenerator(other.m_vertexIdGenerator),
202  m_interfaceIdGenerator(other.m_interfaceIdGenerator),
203  m_cellIdGenerator(other.m_cellIdGenerator),
204  m_nInternalVertices(other.m_nInternalVertices),
205 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
206  m_nGhostVertices(other.m_nGhostVertices),
207 #endif
208  m_lastInternalVertexId(other.m_lastInternalVertexId),
209 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
210  m_firstGhostVertexId(other.m_firstGhostVertexId),
211 #endif
212  m_nInternalCells(other.m_nInternalCells),
213 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
214  m_nGhostCells(other.m_nGhostCells),
215 #endif
216  m_lastInternalCellId(other.m_lastInternalCellId),
217 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
218  m_firstGhostCellId(other.m_firstGhostCellId),
219 #endif
220  m_vtk(other.m_vtk),
221  m_vtkWriteTarget(other.m_vtkWriteTarget),
222  m_vtkVertexMap(other.m_vtkVertexMap),
223  m_boxFrozen(other.m_boxFrozen),
224  m_boxDirty(other.m_boxDirty),
225  m_boxMinPoint(other.m_boxMinPoint),
226  m_boxMaxPoint(other.m_boxMaxPoint),
227  m_boxMinCounter(other.m_boxMinCounter),
228  m_boxMaxCounter(other.m_boxMaxCounter),
229  m_adjacenciesBuildStrategy(other.m_adjacenciesBuildStrategy),
230  m_interfacesBuildStrategy(other.m_interfacesBuildStrategy),
231  m_spawnStatus(other.m_spawnStatus),
232  m_adaptionStatus(other.m_adaptionStatus),
233  m_expert(other.m_expert),
234  m_dimension(other.m_dimension),
235  m_toleranceCustom(other.m_toleranceCustom),
236  m_tolerance(other.m_tolerance),
237  m_rank(other.m_rank),
238  m_nProcessors(other.m_nProcessors)
239 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
240  , m_communicator(MPI_COMM_NULL),
241  m_partitioningStatus(other.m_partitioningStatus),
242  m_owner(other.m_owner),
243  m_haloSize(other.m_haloSize),
244  m_partitioningCellsTag(other.m_partitioningCellsTag),
245  m_partitioningVerticesTag(other.m_partitioningVerticesTag),
246  m_partitioningSerialization(other.m_partitioningSerialization),
247  m_partitioningOutgoings(other.m_partitioningOutgoings),
248  m_partitioningGlobalExchanges(other.m_partitioningGlobalExchanges),
249  m_partitioningInfoDirty(other.m_partitioningInfoDirty),
250  m_ghostVertexOwners(other.m_ghostVertexOwners),
251  m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets(other.m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets),
252  m_ghostVertexExchangeSources(other.m_ghostVertexExchangeSources),
253  m_ghostCellOwners(other.m_ghostCellOwners),
254  m_ghostCellExchangeTargets(other.m_ghostCellExchangeTargets),
255  m_ghostCellExchangeSources(other.m_ghostCellExchangeSources)
256 #endif
257 {
258  // Register the patch
259  patch::manager().registerPatch(this);
260 
261  // Update the VTK streamer
262  //
263  // The pointer to VTK streamers are copied, if there are pointer to the
264  // original object they have to be replace with a pointer to this object.
265  std::vector<std::string> streamedGeomFields;
266  streamedGeomFields.reserve(m_vtk.getGeomDataCount());
267  for (auto itr = m_vtk.getGeomDataBegin(); itr != m_vtk.getGeomDataEnd(); ++itr) {
268  const VTKField &field = *itr;
269  if (&field.getStreamer() != &other) {
270  continue;
271  }
272 
273  streamedGeomFields.push_back(field.getName());
274  }
275 
276  for (const std::string &name : streamedGeomFields) {
277  const VTKField &field = *(m_vtk.findGeomData(name));
278  VTKField updatedField(field);
279  updatedField.setStreamer(*this);
280 
281  m_vtk.setGeomData(std::move(updatedField));
282  }
283 
284  std::vector<std::string> streamedDataFields;
285  streamedDataFields.reserve(m_vtk.getDataCount());
286  for (auto itr = m_vtk.getDataBegin(); itr != m_vtk.getDataEnd(); ++itr) {
287  const VTKField &field = *itr;
288  if (&field.getStreamer() != &other) {
289  continue;
290  }
291 
292  streamedDataFields.push_back(field.getName());
293  }
294 
295  for (const std::string &name : streamedDataFields) {
296  const VTKField &field = *(m_vtk.findData(name));
297  VTKField updatedField(field);
298  updatedField.setStreamer(*this);
299 
300  m_vtk.removeData(field.getName());
301  m_vtk.addData(std::move(updatedField));
302  }
303 
304 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
305  // Set the communicator
306  MPI_Comm communicator = other.getCommunicator();
307  if (communicator != MPI_COMM_NULL) {
308  initializeCommunicator(communicator);
309  }
310 #endif
311 }
312 
316 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
323 void PatchKernel::initialize(MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize)
324 #else
325 void PatchKernel::initialize()
326 #endif
327 {
328  // Id
329  m_id = PatchManager::AUTOMATIC_ID;
330 
331  // Vertex count
332  m_nInternalVertices = 0;
333 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
334  m_nGhostVertices = 0;
335 #endif
336 
337  m_lastInternalVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
338 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
339  m_firstGhostVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
340 #endif
341 
342  // Cell count
343  m_nInternalCells = 0;
344 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
345  m_nGhostCells = 0;
346 #endif
347 
348  m_lastInternalCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
349 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
350  m_firstGhostCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
351 #endif
352 
353  // Dimension
354  m_dimension = -1;
355 
356  // Set adjacencies build strategy
357  setAdjacenciesBuildStrategy(ADJACENCIES_NONE);
358 
359  // Set interfaces build strategy
360  setInterfacesBuildStrategy(INTERFACES_NONE);
361 
362  // Set the spawn as unneeded
363  //
364  // Specific implementation will set the appropriate status during their
365  // initialization.
366  setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_UNNEEDED);
367 
368  // Set the adaption as unsupported
369  //
370  // Specific implementation will set the appropriate status during their
371  // initialization.
372  setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED);
373 
374 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
375  // Initialize communicator
376  initializeCommunicator(communicator);
377 
378  // Set halo size
379  initializeHaloSize(haloSize);
380 
381  // Mark patch as partioned
382  if (isPartitioned()) {
383  setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_CLEAN);
384  } else {
385  setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_UNSUPPORTED);
386  }
387 
388  // Initialize partitioning tags
389  m_partitioningCellsTag = -1;
390  m_partitioningVerticesTag = -1;
391 
392  // Update partitioning information
393  if (isPartitioned()) {
394  updatePartitioningInfo(true);
395  }
396 #else
397  // Dummy parallel information
398  m_rank = 0;
399  m_nProcessors = 1;
400 #endif
401 
402  // Initialize the geometrical tolerance
403  resetTol();
404 
405  // Initializes the bounding box
406  setBoundingBoxFrozen(false);
407  clearBoundingBox();
408 
409  // Set VTK write target
410  m_vtkWriteTarget = WRITE_TARGET_CELLS_ALL;
411 
412  // Set VTK information
413  std::ostringstream convert;
414  convert << getId();
415 
416  m_vtk.setName(convert.str());
417  m_vtk.setCodex(VTKFormat::APPENDED);
418 
419  // Set VTK Geom Data
420  m_vtk.setGeomData<double>(VTKUnstructuredField::POINTS, this);
421  m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::OFFSETS, this);
422  m_vtk.setGeomData<int>(VTKUnstructuredField::TYPES, this);
423  m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::CONNECTIVITY, this);
424  m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_STREAMS, this);
425  m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_OFFSETS, this);
426 
427  // Add VTK basic patch data
428  m_vtk.addData<long>("cellIndex", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
429  m_vtk.addData<int>("PID", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
430  m_vtk.addData<long>("vertexIndex", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::POINT, this);
431 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
432  m_vtk.addData<long>("cellGlobalIndex", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
433  m_vtk.addData<int>("cellRank", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
434  m_vtk.addData<int>("vertexRank", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::POINT, this);
435 #endif
436 }
437 
441 PatchKernel::~PatchKernel()
442 {
443 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
444  freeCommunicator();
445 #endif
446 
447  try {
448  patch::manager().unregisterPatch(this);
449  } catch (const std::runtime_error &e) {
450  log::cout() << "Unable to unregister the patch" << std::endl;
451  log::cout() << " Error message: " << e.what() << std::endl;
452  }
453 }
454 
465 std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::update(bool trackAdaption, bool squeezeStorage)
466 {
467  std::vector<adaption::Info> updateInfo;
468 
469  // Early return if the patch is not dirty
470  //
471  // If we need to squeeze the storage we need to perform the update also
472  // if the patch is not dirty.
473  if (!squeezeStorage && !isDirty(true)) {
474  return updateInfo;
475  }
476 
477  // Finalize alterations
478  finalizeAlterations(squeezeStorage);
479 
480  // Spawn
481  bool spawnNeeed = (getSpawnStatus() == SPAWN_NEEDED);
482  if (spawnNeeed) {
483  mergeAdaptionInfo(spawn(trackAdaption), updateInfo);
484  }
485 
486  // Adaption
487  bool adaptionDirty = (getAdaptionStatus(true) == ADAPTION_DIRTY);
488  if (adaptionDirty) {
489  mergeAdaptionInfo(adaption(trackAdaption, squeezeStorage), updateInfo);
490  }
491 
492  return updateInfo;
493 }
494 
505 void PatchKernel::simulateCellUpdate(const long id, adaption::Marker marker, std::vector<Cell> *virtualCells, PiercedVector<Vertex, long> *virtualVertices) const
506 {
507  BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
508  BITPIT_UNUSED(marker);
509  BITPIT_UNUSED(virtualCells);
510  BITPIT_UNUSED(virtualVertices);
511 
512  throw std::runtime_error ("This function has not been implemented for the specified patch.");
513 }
514 
522 std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::spawn(bool trackSpawn)
523 {
524  std::vector<adaption::Info> spawnInfo;
525 
526 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
527  // This is a collevtive operation and should be called by all processes
528  if (isPartitioned()) {
529  const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
530  MPI_Barrier(communicator);
531  }
532 #endif
533 
534  // Check spawn status
535  SpawnStatus spawnStatus = getSpawnStatus();
536  if (spawnStatus == SPAWN_UNNEEDED || spawnStatus == SPAWN_DONE) {
537  return spawnInfo;
538  }
539 
540  // Spawn the patch
541  spawnInfo = _spawn(trackSpawn);
542 
543  // Finalize patch alterations
544  finalizeAlterations(true);
545 
546  // Spwan is done
547  setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_DONE);
548 
549  // Done
550  return spawnInfo;
551 }
552 
563 std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::adaption(bool trackAdaption, bool squeezeStorage)
564 {
565  std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfo;
566 
567  // Check adaption status
568  AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus(true);
569  if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
570  return adaptionInfo;
571  } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_DIRTY) {
572  throw std::runtime_error ("An adaption is already in progress.");
573  }
574 
575  adaptionPrepare(false);
576 
577  adaptionInfo = adaptionAlter(trackAdaption, squeezeStorage);
578 
579  adaptionCleanup();
580 
581  return adaptionInfo;
582 }
583 
597 std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::adaptionPrepare(bool trackAdaption)
598 {
599  std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfo;
600 
601  // Check adaption status
602  AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus(true);
603  if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
604  return adaptionInfo;
605  } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_DIRTY) {
606  throw std::runtime_error ("An adaption is already in progress.");
607  }
608 
609  // Execute the adaption preparation
610  adaptionInfo = _adaptionPrepare(trackAdaption);
611 
612  // Update the status
613  setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_PREPARED);
614 
615  return adaptionInfo;
616 }
617 
633 std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::adaptionAlter(bool trackAdaption, bool squeezeStorage)
634 {
635  std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfo;
636 
637  // Check adaption status
638  AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus();
639  if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
640  return adaptionInfo;
641  } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_PREPARED) {
642  throw std::runtime_error ("The prepare function has not been called.");
643  }
644 
645  // Adapt the patch
646  adaptionInfo = _adaptionAlter(trackAdaption);
647 
648  // Finalize patch alterations
649  finalizeAlterations(squeezeStorage);
650 
651  // Update the status
652  setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_ALTERED);
653 
654  return adaptionInfo;
655 }
656 
662 void PatchKernel::adaptionCleanup()
663 {
664  AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus();
665  if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
666  return;
667  } else if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_PREPARED) {
668  throw std::runtime_error ("It is not yet possible to abort an adaption.");
669  } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_ALTERED) {
670  throw std::runtime_error ("The alter function has not been called.");
671  }
672 
673  // Complete the adaption
674  _adaptionCleanup();
675 
676  // Update the status
677  setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_CLEAN);
678 }
679 
684 void PatchKernel::settleAdaptionMarkers()
685 {
686  // Nothing to do
687 }
688 
695 void PatchKernel::finalizeAlterations(bool squeezeStorage)
696 {
697  // Flush vertex data structures
698  m_vertices.flush();
699 
700  // Update bounding box
701  bool boundingBoxDirty = isBoundingBoxDirty();
702  if (boundingBoxDirty) {
703  updateBoundingBox();
704  }
705 
706  // Flush cell data structures
707  m_cells.flush();
708 
709  // Update adjacencies
710  bool adjacenciesDirty = areAdjacenciesDirty();
711  if (adjacenciesDirty) {
712  updateAdjacencies();
713  }
714 
715  // Update interfaces
716  bool interfacesDirty = areInterfacesDirty();
717  if (interfacesDirty) {
718  updateInterfaces();
719  }
720 
721  // Flush interfaces data structures
722  m_interfaces.flush();
723 
724  // Squeeze the patch
725  if (squeezeStorage) {
726  squeeze();
727  }
728 
729 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
730  // Update partitioning information
731  bool partitioningInfoDirty = arePartitioningInfoDirty();
732  if (partitioningInfoDirty) {
733  updatePartitioningInfo(true);
734  }
735 #endif
736 
737  // Clear alteration flags
738  m_alteredCells.clear();
739  m_alteredInterfaces.clear();
740 
741  // Synchronize storage
742  m_cells.sync();
743  m_interfaces.sync();
744  m_vertices.sync();
745 }
746

823 void PatchKernel::reset()
824 {
825  resetVertices();
826  resetCells();
827  resetInterfaces();
828 }
829 
833 void PatchKernel::resetVertices()
834 {
835  m_vertices.clear();
836  m_vertexIdGenerator.reset();
837  m_nInternalVertices = 0;
838 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
839  m_nGhostVertices = 0;
840 #endif
841  m_lastInternalVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
842 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
843  m_firstGhostVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
844 #endif
845 
846  for (auto &cell : m_cells) {
847  cell.unsetConnect();
848  }
849 }
850 
854 void PatchKernel::resetCells()
855 {
856  m_cells.clear();
857  m_cellIdGenerator.reset();
858  m_nInternalCells = 0;
859 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
860  m_nGhostCells = 0;
861 #endif
862  m_lastInternalCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
863 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
864  m_firstGhostCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
865 #endif
866 
867 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
868  clearGhostCellOwners();
869  clearGhostVertexOwners();
870 #endif
871 
872  resetAdjacencies();
873 
874  for (auto &interface : m_interfaces) {
875  interface.unsetNeigh();
876  interface.unsetOwner();
877  }
878 
879  m_alteredCells.clear();
880 }
881 
888 void PatchKernel::resetInterfaces()
889 {
890  // Early return if no interfaces have been built
891  if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_NONE) {
892  return;
893  }
894 
895  // Prune stale interfaces
896  pruneStaleInterfaces();
897 
898  // All remaining interfaces will be deleted
899  setInterfaceAlterationFlags(FLAG_DELETED);
900 
901  // Mark cell interfaces as dirty
902  setCellAlterationFlags(FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
903 
904  // Reset the interfaces
905  _resetInterfaces();
906 }
907 
913 void PatchKernel::_resetInterfaces()
914 {
915  for (auto &cell : m_cells) {
916  cell.resetInterfaces();
917  }
918 
919  m_interfaces.clear();
920  m_interfaceIdGenerator.reset();
921 }
922 
936 bool PatchKernel::reserveVertices(size_t nVertices)
937 {
938  if (!isExpert()) {
939  return false;
940  }
941 
942  m_vertices.reserve(nVertices);
943 
944  return true;
945 }
946 
959 bool PatchKernel::reserveCells(size_t nCells)
960 {
961  if (!isExpert()) {
962  return false;
963  }
964 
965  m_cells.reserve(nCells);
966 
967  return true;
968 }

984 bool PatchKernel::reserveInterfaces(size_t nInterfaces)
985 {
986  if (!isExpert()) {
987  return false;
988  }
989 
990  m_interfaces.reserve(nInterfaces);
991 
992  return true;
993 }
994 
1001 void PatchKernel::write(const std::string &filename, VTKWriteMode mode)
1002 {
1003  std::string oldFilename = m_vtk.getName();
1004 
1005  m_vtk.setName(filename);
1006  write(mode);
1007  m_vtk.setName(oldFilename);
1008 }
1009 
1015 void PatchKernel::write(VTKWriteMode mode)
1016 {
1017  // Get VTK cell count
1018  long vtkCellCount = 0;
1019  if (m_vtkWriteTarget == WRITE_TARGET_CELLS_ALL) {
1020  vtkCellCount = getCellCount();
1021 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1022  } else if (m_vtkWriteTarget == WRITE_TARGET_CELLS_INTERNAL) {
1023  vtkCellCount = getInternalCellCount();
1024 #endif
1025  }
1026 
1027  // Set the dimensinos of the mesh
1028  PiercedStorage<bool, long> vertexWriteFlag(1, &m_vertices);
1029  vertexWriteFlag.fill(false);
1030 
1031  bool vtkFaceStreamNeeded = false;
1032  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
1033  if (cell.getDimension() > 2 && !cell.hasInfo()) {
1034  vtkFaceStreamNeeded = true;
1035  break;
1036  }
1037  }
1038 
1039  long vtkConnectSize = 0;
1040  long vtkFaceStreamSize = 0;
1041  for (const Cell &cell : getVTKCellWriteRange()) {
1042  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
1043  const int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
1044  for (int k = 0; k < nCellVertices; ++k) {
1045  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[k];
1046  vertexWriteFlag.at(vertexId) = true;
1047  }
1048 
1049  vtkConnectSize += nCellVertices;
1050  if (vtkFaceStreamNeeded) {
1051  if (cell.getDimension() <= 2 || cell.hasInfo()) {
1052  vtkFaceStreamSize += 1;
1053  } else {
1054  vtkFaceStreamSize += cell.getFaceStreamSize();
1055  }
1056  }
1057  }
1058 
1059  int vtkVertexCount = 0;
1060  m_vtkVertexMap.unsetKernel(true);
1061  m_vtkVertexMap.setStaticKernel(&m_vertices);
1062  for (VertexConstIterator itr = vertexConstBegin(); itr != vertexConstEnd(); ++itr) {
1063  std::size_t vertexRawId = itr.getRawIndex();
1064  if (vertexWriteFlag.rawAt(vertexRawId)) {
1065  m_vtkVertexMap.rawAt(vertexRawId) = vtkVertexCount++;
1066  } else {
1067  m_vtkVertexMap.rawAt(vertexRawId) = Vertex::NULL_ID;
1068  }
1069  }
1070 
1071  m_vtk.setDimensions(vtkCellCount, vtkVertexCount, vtkConnectSize, vtkFaceStreamSize);
1072 
1073  // Write the mesh
1074  m_vtk.write(mode);
1075 }
1076 
1082 PatchKernel::SpawnStatus PatchKernel::getSpawnStatus() const
1083 {
1084  // There is no need to check the spawn status globally because the spawn
1085  // status will always be the same on all the processes.
1086 
1087  return m_spawnStatus;
1088 }
1089 
1095 void PatchKernel::setSpawnStatus(SpawnStatus status)
1096 {
1097  m_spawnStatus = status;
1098 }

1100 
1106 bool PatchKernel::isAdaptionSupported() const
1107 {
1108  return (getAdaptionStatus() != ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED);
1109 }
1110 
1118 PatchKernel::AdaptionStatus PatchKernel::getAdaptionStatus(bool global) const
1119 {
1120  int adaptionStatus = static_cast<int>(m_adaptionStatus);
1121 
1122 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1123  if (global && isPartitioned()) {
1124  const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
1125  MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &adaptionStatus, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_MAX, communicator);
1126  }
1127 #else
1128  BITPIT_UNUSED(global);
1129 #endif
1130 
1131  return static_cast<AdaptionStatus>(adaptionStatus);
1132 }
1133 
1139 void PatchKernel::setAdaptionStatus(AdaptionStatus status)
1140 {
1141  m_adaptionStatus = status;
1142 }
1143 
1152 bool PatchKernel::isDirty(bool global) const
1153 {
1154 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
1155  BITPIT_UNUSED(global);
1156 #endif
1157 
1158  bool isDirty = false;
1159 
1160  if (!isDirty) {
1161  isDirty |= areAdjacenciesDirty(false);
1162  }
1163 
1164  if (!isDirty) {
1165  isDirty |= !m_alteredCells.empty();
1166  }
1167 
1168  if (!isDirty) {
1169  isDirty |= areInterfacesDirty(false);
1170  assert(isDirty || m_alteredInterfaces.empty());
1171  }
1172 
1173  if (!isDirty) {
1174  isDirty |= (getSpawnStatus() == SPAWN_NEEDED);
1175  }
1176 
1177  if (!isDirty) {
1178  isDirty |= (getAdaptionStatus(false) == ADAPTION_DIRTY);
1179  }
1180 
1181  if (!isDirty) {
1182  isDirty |= isBoundingBoxDirty(false);
1183  }
1184 
1185 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1186  if (!isDirty) {
1187  isDirty |= arePartitioningInfoDirty(false);
1188  }
1189 #endif
1190 
1191  if (!isDirty) {
1192  isDirty |= !m_vertices.isSynced();
1193  }
1194 
1195  if (!isDirty) {
1196  isDirty |= !m_cells.isSynced();
1197  }
1198 
1199  if (!isDirty) {
1200  isDirty |= !m_interfaces.isSynced();
1201  }
1202 
1203 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1204  // Get the global flag
1205  if (global && isPartitioned()) {
1206  const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
1207  MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &isDirty, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LOR, communicator);
1208  }
1209 #endif
1210 
1211  return isDirty;
1212 }
1213

1226  return;
1227  }
1228 
1229  m_expert = expert;
1230 }

1272 void PatchKernel::setDimension(int dimension)
1273 {
1274  if (dimension == m_dimension) {
1275  return;
1276  }
1277 
1278  // If the dimension was already assigned, reset the patch
1279  if (m_dimension > 0) {
1280  reset();
1281  }
1282 
1283  // Set the dimension
1284  m_dimension = dimension;
1285 }

1404 PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::internalVertexEnd()
1405 {

1407  return ++m_vertices.find(m_lastInternalVertexId);
1408  } else {
1409  return m_vertices.end();
1410  }

1461 PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::addVertex(const Vertex &source, long id)
1462 {
1463  Vertex vertex = source;
1464  vertex.setId(id);
1465 
1466  return addVertex(std::move(vertex), id);
1467 }
1468 
1486 PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::addVertex(Vertex &&source, long id)
1487 {
1488  if (id < 0) {
1489  id = source.getId();
1490  }
1491 
1492  VertexIterator iterator = addVertex(source.getCoords(), id);
1493 
1494  Vertex &vertex = (*iterator);
1495  id = vertex.getId();
1496  vertex = std::move(source);
1497  vertex.setId(id);
1498  vertex.setInterior(true);
1499 
1500  return iterator;
1501 }
1502 
1521 PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::addVertex(const std::array<double, 3> &coords, long id)
1522 {
1523  if (!isExpert()) {
1524  return vertexEnd();
1525  }
1526 
1527  if (id < 0) {
1528  id = m_vertexIdGenerator.generate();
1529  } else {
1530  m_vertexIdGenerator.setAssigned(id);
1531  }
1532 
1533  // Add the vertex
1534  VertexIterator iterator = _addInternalVertex(coords, id);
1535 
1536  return iterator;
1537 }
1538 
1553 PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::_addInternalVertex(const std::array<double, 3> &coords, long id)
1554 {
1555  // Get the id of the vertex before which the new vertex should be inserted
1556 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1557  //
1558  // If there are ghosts vertices, the internal vertex should be inserted
1559  // before the first ghost vertex.
1560 #endif
1561  long referenceId;
1562 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1563  referenceId = m_firstGhostVertexId;
1564 #else
1565  referenceId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
1566 #endif
1567 
1568  // Create the vertex
1569  VertexIterator iterator;
1570  if (referenceId == Vertex::NULL_ID) {
1571  iterator = m_vertices.emreclaim(id, id, coords, true);
1572  } else {
1573  iterator = m_vertices.emreclaimBefore(referenceId, id, id, coords, true);
1574  }
1575  m_nInternalVertices++;
1576 
1577  // Update the id of the last internal vertex
1578  if (m_lastInternalVertexId < 0) {
1579  m_lastInternalVertexId = id;
1580  } else if (m_vertices.rawIndex(m_lastInternalVertexId) < m_vertices.rawIndex(id)) {
1581  m_lastInternalVertexId = id;
1582  }
1583 
1584  // Update the bounding box
1585  addPointToBoundingBox(iterator->getCoords());
1586 
1587 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1588  // Set partitioning information as dirty
1589  setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
1590 #endif
1591 
1592  return iterator;
1593 }
1594 
1595 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
1606 PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::restoreVertex(const std::array<double, 3> &coords, long id)
1607 {
1608  if (!isExpert()) {
1609  return vertexEnd();
1610  }
1611 
1612  VertexIterator iterator = m_vertices.find(id);
1613  if (iterator == m_vertices.end()) {
1614  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore the specified vertex: the kernel doesn't contain an entry for that vertex.");
1615  }
1616 
1617  _restoreInternalVertex(iterator, coords);
1618 
1619  return iterator;
1620 }
1621 #endif
1622 
1629 void PatchKernel::_restoreInternalVertex(const VertexIterator &iterator, const std::array<double, 3> &coords)
1630 {
1631  // There is not need to set the id of the vertex as assigned, because
1632  // also the index generator will be restored.
1633  Vertex &vertex = *iterator;
1634  vertex.initialize(iterator.getId(), coords, true);
1635  m_nInternalVertices++;
1636 
1637  // Update the bounding box
1638  addPointToBoundingBox(vertex.getCoords());
1639 }
1640 
1646 bool PatchKernel::deleteVertex(long id)
1647 {
1648  if (!isExpert()) {
1649  return false;
1650  }
1651 
1652  // Delete the vertex
1653 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1654  const Vertex &vertex = m_vertices[id];
1655  bool isInternal = vertex.isInterior();
1656  if (isInternal) {
1657  _deleteInternalVertex(id);
1658  } else {
1659  _deleteGhostVertex(id);
1660  }
1661 #else
1662  _deleteInternalVertex(id);
1663 #endif
1664 
1665  // Vertex id is no longer used
1666  m_vertexIdGenerator.trash(id);
1667 
1668  return true;
1669 }
1670 
1676 bool PatchKernel::deleteVertices(const std::vector<long> &ids)
1677 {
1678  if (!isExpert()) {
1679  return false;
1680  }
1681 
1682  // Deleting the last vertex requires some additional work. If the ids
1683  // of vertices to be deleted contain the last vertex, that vertex is
1684  // deleted after deleting all other vertices. In this way we make sure
1685  // to delete the last vertex just once (after deleting the last vertex,
1686  // another vertex becomes the last one and that vertex may be on the
1687  // deletion list as well, and on and so forth). The same applies for
1688  // the first ghost.
1689  bool deleteLastInternalVertex = false;
1690 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1691  bool deleteFirstGhostVertex = false;
1692 #endif
1693  std::vector<long>::const_iterator end = ids.cend();
1694  for (std::vector<long>::const_iterator i = ids.cbegin(); i != end; ++i) {
1695  long vertexId = *i;
1696  if (vertexId == m_lastInternalVertexId) {
1697  deleteLastInternalVertex = true;
1698  continue;
1699  }
1700 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1701  else if (vertexId == m_firstGhostVertexId) {
1702  deleteFirstGhostVertex = true;
1703  continue;
1704  }
1705 #endif
1706 
1707  deleteVertex(vertexId);
1708  }
1709 
1710  if (deleteLastInternalVertex) {
1711  deleteVertex(m_lastInternalVertexId);
1712  }
1713 
1714 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1715  if (deleteFirstGhostVertex) {
1716  deleteVertex(m_firstGhostVertexId);
1717  }
1718 #endif
1719 
1720  return true;
1721 }
1722 
1728 void PatchKernel::_deleteInternalVertex(long id)
1729 {
1730  // Update the bounding box
1731  const Vertex &vertex = m_vertices[id];
1732  removePointFromBoundingBox(vertex.getCoords());
1733 
1734  // Delete vertex
1735  m_vertices.erase(id, true);
1736  m_nInternalVertices--;
1737  if (id == m_lastInternalVertexId) {
1738  updateLastInternalVertexId();
1739  }
1740 }
1741 
1749 long PatchKernel::countFreeVertices() const
1750 {
1751  std::unordered_set<long> freeVertices;
1752  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
1753  int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
1754  for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
1755  if (!cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
1756  continue;
1757  }
1758 
1759  int nFaceVertices = cell.getFaceVertexCount(i);
1760  for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
1761  long faceVertexId = cell.getFaceVertexId(i, k);
1762  freeVertices.insert(faceVertexId);
1763  }
1764  }
1765  }
1766 
1767  return freeVertices.size();
1768 }
1769 
1777 long PatchKernel::countOrphanVertices() const
1778 {
1779  std::unordered_set<long> usedVertices;
1780  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
1781  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
1782  int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
1783  for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
1784  usedVertices.insert(cellVertexIds[i]);
1785  }
1786  }
1787 
1788  return (getVertexCount() - usedVertices.size());
1789 }
1790 
1798 std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findOrphanVertices()
1799 {
1800  // Detect used vertices
1801  PiercedStorage<bool, long> vertexUsedFlag(1, &m_vertices);
1802  vertexUsedFlag.fill(false);
1803  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
1804  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
1805  int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
1806  for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; ++j) {
1807  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
1808  vertexUsedFlag[vertexId] = true;
1809  }
1810  }
1811 
1812  // Count the orphan vertices
1813  std::size_t nOrhpanVertices = 0;
1814  for (auto itr = m_vertices.begin(); itr != m_vertices.end(); ++itr) {
1815  std::size_t vertexRawIndex = itr.getRawIndex();
1816  if (!vertexUsedFlag.rawAt(vertexRawIndex)) {
1817  ++nOrhpanVertices;
1818  }
1819  }
1820 
1821  // Build a list of unused vertices
1822  std::vector<long> orhpanVertices(nOrhpanVertices);
1823 
1824  std::size_t orphanVertexIndex = 0;
1825  for (auto itr = m_vertices.begin(); itr != m_vertices.end(); ++itr) {
1826  std::size_t vertexRawIndex = itr.getRawIndex();
1827  if (!vertexUsedFlag.rawAt(vertexRawIndex)) {
1828  orhpanVertices[orphanVertexIndex] = itr.getId();
1829  ++orphanVertexIndex;
1830  }
1831  }
1832 
1833  return orhpanVertices;
1834 }
1835 
1839 bool PatchKernel::deleteOrphanVertices()
1840 {
1841  if (!isExpert()) {
1842  return false;
1843  }
1844 
1845  std::vector<long> list = findOrphanVertices();
1846  deleteVertices(list);
1847 
1848  return true;
1849 }
1850 
1857 std::vector<long> PatchKernel::collapseCoincidentVertices()
1858 {
1859  std::vector<long> collapsedVertices;
1860  if (!isExpert()) {
1861  return collapsedVertices;
1862  }
1863 
1864  long nVertices = getVertexCount();
1865  if (nVertices == 0) {
1866  return collapsedVertices;
1867  }
1868 
1869  // Random number generator
1870  srand(1223145611);
1871 
1872  // Update bounding box
1873  updateBoundingBox();
1874 
1875  // Define a sensible values for the number of bins
1876  int nBoxDimensions = 3;
1877  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1878  if (utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()(m_boxMaxPoint[k], m_boxMinPoint[k], getTol())) {
1879  --nBoxDimensions;
1880  }
1881  }
1882 
1883  int nBins;
1884  if (nBoxDimensions != 0) {
1885  nBins = std::ceil(std::pow(nVertices, 1. / (double) nBoxDimensions));
1886  if (nBins < 16) {
1887  nBins = 16;
1888  } else if (nBins > 128) {
1889  nBins = 128;
1890  }
1891  } else {
1892  nBins = 1;
1893  }
1894 
1895  // Group vertices into bins
1896  std::unordered_map<long, std::vector<long>> bins = binGroupVertices(nBins);
1897 
1898  //
1899  // Collapse double vertices
1900  //
1901 
1902  // Evaluate vertex map
1903  std::size_t nMaxBinVertices = 0;
1904  for (const auto &binEntry : bins) {
1905  nMaxBinVertices = std::max(binEntry.second.size(), nMaxBinVertices);
1906  }
1907 
1908  std::vector<int> randomExtraction;
1909  randomExtraction.reserve(nMaxBinVertices);
1910  KdTree<3, Vertex, long> kd(nMaxBinVertices);
1911 
1912  std::unordered_map<long, long> vertexMap;
1913  for (const auto &binEntry : bins) {
1914  const std::vector<long> &binVertices = binEntry.second;
1915  int nBinVertices = binVertices.size();
1916 
1917  // Randomize vertex insertion
1918  randomExtraction.clear();
1919  utils::extractWithoutReplacement(nBinVertices, nBinVertices - 1, randomExtraction);
1920 
1921  // Vertex insertion
1922  kd.clear();
1923  for (int j = 0; j < nBinVertices; ++j) {
1924  long vertexId = binVertices[randomExtraction[j]];
1925  Vertex &vertex = m_vertices.at(vertexId);
1926 
1927  long collapsedVertexId;
1928  if (kd.exist(&vertex, collapsedVertexId) < 0) {
1929  collapsedVertexId = vertexId;
1930  kd.insert(&vertex, vertexId);
1931  } else {
1932  vertexMap.insert({vertexId, collapsedVertexId});
1933  }
1934  }
1935  }
1936 
1937  // Collapse vertices
1938  if (!vertexMap.empty()) {
1939  // Renumber cell vertices
1940  for (Cell &cell : m_cells) {
1941  cell.renumberVertices(vertexMap);
1942  }
1943 
1944  // Create the list of collapsed vertices
1945  collapsedVertices.resize(vertexMap.size());
1946 
1947  std::size_t k = 0;
1948  for (const auto &entry : vertexMap) {
1949  collapsedVertices[k++] = entry.first;
1950  }
1951  }
1952 
1953  return collapsedVertices;
1954 }
1955 
1959 bool PatchKernel::deleteCoincidentVertices()
1960 {
1961  if (!isExpert()) {
1962  return false;
1963  }
1964 
1965  std::vector<long> verticesToDelete = collapseCoincidentVertices();
1966  deleteVertices(verticesToDelete);
1967 
1968  return true;
1969 }
1970 
1977 const std::array<double, 3> & PatchKernel::getVertexCoords(long id) const
1978 {
1979  return getVertex(id).getCoords();
1980 }
1981 
1989 void PatchKernel::getVertexCoords(std::size_t nVertices, const long *ids, std::unique_ptr<std::array<double, 3>[]> *coordinates) const
1990 {
1991  *coordinates = std::unique_ptr<std::array<double, 3>[]>(new std::array<double, 3>[nVertices]);
1992  getVertexCoords(nVertices, ids, coordinates->get());
1993 }
1994 
2004 void PatchKernel::getVertexCoords(std::size_t nVertices, const long *ids, std::array<double, 3> *coordinates) const
2005 {
2006  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < nVertices; ++i) {
2007  coordinates[i] = getVertex(ids[i]).getCoords();
2008  }
2009 }
2010 
2016 bool PatchKernel::empty() const
2017 {
2018  bool isEmpty = (getCellCount() == 0);
2019 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2020  if (isPartitioned()) {
2021  MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &isEmpty, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LAND, getCommunicator());
2022  }
2023 #endif
2024 
2025  return isEmpty;
2026 }
2027 
2031 void PatchKernel::updateLastInternalVertexId()
2032 {
2033  if (m_nInternalVertices == 0) {
2034  m_lastInternalVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
2035  return;
2036  }
2037 
2038  VertexIterator lastInternalVertexItr;
2039 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2040  if (m_nGhostVertices == 0) {
2041  lastInternalVertexItr = --m_vertices.end();
2042  m_lastInternalVertexId = lastInternalVertexItr->getId();
2043  } else {
2044  m_lastInternalVertexId = m_vertices.getSizeMarker(m_nInternalVertices - 1, Vertex::NULL_ID);
2045  }
2046 #else
2047  lastInternalVertexItr = --m_vertices.end();
2048  m_lastInternalVertexId = lastInternalVertexItr->getId();
2049 #endif
2050 }
2051

2320 PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(const Cell &source, long id)
2321 {
2322  Cell cell = source;
2323  cell.setId(id);
2324 
2325  return addCell(std::move(cell), id);
2326 }
2327 
2342 PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(Cell &&source, long id)
2343 {
2344  if (id < 0) {
2345  id = source.getId();
2346  }
2347 
2348  int connectSize = source.getConnectSize();
2349  std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
2350  if (!source.hasInfo()){
2351  std::copy(source.getConnect(), source.getConnect() + connectSize, connectStorage.get());
2352  }
2353 
2354  CellIterator iterator = addCell(source.getType(), std::move(connectStorage), id);
2355 
2356  Cell &cell = (*iterator);
2357  id = cell.getId();
2358  cell = std::move(source);
2359  cell.setId(id);
2360 
2361  return iterator;
2362 }
2363 
2379 PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(ElementType type, long id)
2380 {
2381  std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage;
2382  if (ReferenceElementInfo::hasInfo(type)) {
2383  int connectSize = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(type).nVertices;
2384  connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
2385  } else {
2386  connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(nullptr);
2387  }
2388 
2389  return addCell(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
2390 }
2391 
2408 PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(ElementType type, const std::vector<long> &connectivity,
2409  long id)
2410 {
2411  int connectSize = connectivity.size();
2412  std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
2413  std::copy(connectivity.data(), connectivity.data() + connectSize, connectStorage.get());
2414 
2415  return addCell(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
2416 }
2417 
2435 PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(ElementType type, std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
2436  long id)
2437 {
2438  if (!isExpert()) {
2439  return cellEnd();
2440  }
2441 
2442  if (id < 0) {
2443  id = m_cellIdGenerator.generate();
2444  } else {
2445  m_cellIdGenerator.setAssigned(id);
2446  }
2447 
2448  if (Cell::getDimension(type) > getDimension()) {
2449  return cellEnd();
2450  }
2451 
2452  CellIterator iterator = _addInternalCell(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
2453 
2454  return iterator;
2455 }
2456 
2473 PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::_addInternalCell(ElementType type, std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
2474  long id)
2475 {
2476  // Get the id of the cell before which the new cell should be inserted
2477 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2478  //
2479  // If there are ghosts cells, the internal cell should be inserted
2480  // before the first ghost cell.
2481 #endif
2482  long referenceId;
2483 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2484  referenceId = m_firstGhostCellId;
2485 #else
2486  referenceId = Cell::NULL_ID;
2487 #endif
2488 
2489  // Create the cell
2490  CellIterator iterator;
2491  if (referenceId == Cell::NULL_ID) {
2492  iterator = m_cells.emreclaim(id, id, type, std::move(connectStorage), true, true);
2493  } else {
2494  iterator = m_cells.emreclaimBefore(referenceId, id, id, type, std::move(connectStorage), true, true);
2495  }
2496  m_nInternalCells++;
2497 
2498  // Update the id of the last internal cell
2499  if (m_lastInternalCellId < 0) {
2500  m_lastInternalCellId = id;
2501  } else if (m_cells.rawIndex(m_lastInternalCellId) < m_cells.rawIndex(id)) {
2502  m_lastInternalCellId = id;
2503  }
2504 
2505  // Set the alteration flags of the cell
2506  setAddedCellAlterationFlags(id);
2507 
2508 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2509  // Set partitioning information as dirty
2510  setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
2511 #endif
2512 
2513  return iterator;
2514 }
2515 
2524 void PatchKernel::setAddedCellAlterationFlags(long id)
2525 {
2526  setCellAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY | FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
2527 }
2528 
2529 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
2542 PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::restoreCell(ElementType type, std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
2543  long id)
2544 {
2545  if (!isExpert()) {
2546  return cellEnd();
2547  }
2548 
2549  if (Cell::getDimension(type) > getDimension()) {
2550  return cellEnd();
2551  }
2552 
2553  CellIterator iterator = m_cells.find(id);
2554  if (iterator == m_cells.end()) {
2555  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore the specified cell: the kernel doesn't contain an entry for that cell.");
2556  }
2557 
2558  _restoreInternalCell(iterator, type, std::move(connectStorage));
2559 
2560  return iterator;
2561 }
2562 #endif
2563 
2572 void PatchKernel::_restoreInternalCell(const CellIterator &iterator, ElementType type,
2573  std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage)
2574 {
2575  // There is not need to set the id of the cell as assigned, because
2576  // also the index generator will be restored.
2577  long cellId = iterator.getId();
2578  Cell &cell = *iterator;
2579  cell.initialize(cellId, type, std::move(connectStorage), true, true);
2580  m_nInternalCells++;
2581 
2582  // Set the alteration flags of the cell
2583  setRestoredCellAlterationFlags(cellId);
2584 }
2585 
2591 void PatchKernel::setRestoredCellAlterationFlags(long id)
2592 {
2593  setCellAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY | FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
2594 }
2595 
2601 bool PatchKernel::deleteCell(long id)
2602 {
2603  if (!isExpert()) {
2604  return false;
2605  }
2606 
2607  // Delete cell
2608 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2609  const Cell &cell = m_cells[id];
2610  bool isInternalCell = cell.isInterior();
2611  if (isInternalCell) {
2612  _deleteInternalCell(id);
2613  } else {
2614  _deleteGhostCell(id);
2615  }
2616 #else
2617  _deleteInternalCell(id);
2618 #endif
2619 
2620  // Cell id is no longer used
2621  m_cellIdGenerator.trash(id);
2622 
2623  return true;
2624 }
2625 
2631 bool PatchKernel::deleteCells(const std::vector<long> &ids)
2632 {
2633  if (!isExpert()) {
2634  return false;
2635  }
2636 
2637  // Deleteing the last internal cell requires some additional work. If the
2638  // ids of cells to be deleted contains the last internal cell, we delete
2639  // that cell ater deleting all other cells. In this way we make sure to
2640  // deleting the last internal cells just once (after deleting the last
2641  // internal, another cells becomes the last one and that cells may be
2642  // on the deletion list, and on and so forth). The same applies for the
2643  // first ghost.
2644  bool deleteLastInternalCell = false;
2645 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2646  bool deleteFirstGhostCell = false;
2647 #endif
2648  std::vector<long>::const_iterator end = ids.cend();
2649  for (std::vector<long>::const_iterator i = ids.cbegin(); i != end; ++i) {
2650  long cellId = *i;
2651  if (cellId == m_lastInternalCellId) {
2652  deleteLastInternalCell = true;
2653  continue;
2654  }
2655 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2656  else if (cellId == m_firstGhostCellId) {
2657  deleteFirstGhostCell = true;
2658  continue;
2659  }
2660 #endif
2661 
2662  deleteCell(cellId);
2663  }
2664 
2665  if (deleteLastInternalCell) {
2666  deleteCell(m_lastInternalCellId);
2667  }
2668 
2669 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2670  if (deleteFirstGhostCell) {
2671  deleteCell(m_firstGhostCellId);
2672  }
2673 #endif
2674 
2675  return true;
2676 }
2677 
2683 void PatchKernel::_deleteInternalCell(long id)
2684 {
2685  // Set the alteration flags of the cell
2686  setDeletedCellAlterationFlags(id);
2687 
2688  // Delete cell
2689  m_cells.erase(id, true);
2690  m_nInternalCells--;
2691  if (id == m_lastInternalCellId) {
2692  updateLastInternalCellId();
2693  }
2694 }
2695 
2703 void PatchKernel::setDeletedCellAlterationFlags(long id)
2704 {
2705  const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
2706 
2707  // Set the alteration flags of the cell
2708  resetCellAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_DELETED);
2709 
2710  // Set the alteration flags of the adjacencies
2711  const int nCellAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount();
2712  const long *cellAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies();
2713  for (int k = 0; k < nCellAdjacencies; ++k) {
2714  long adjacencyId = cellAdjacencies[k];
2715  if (!testCellAlterationFlags(adjacencyId, FLAG_DELETED)) {
2716  setCellAlterationFlags(adjacencyId, FLAG_DANGLING | FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY | FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
2717  }
2718  }
2719 
2720  // Set the alteration flags of the interfaces
2721  const int nCellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaceCount();
2722  const long *cellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaces();
2723  for (int k = 0; k < nCellInterfaces; ++k) {
2724  long interfaceId = cellInterfaces[k];
2725  if (!testInterfaceAlterationFlags(interfaceId, FLAG_DELETED)) {
2726  setInterfaceAlterationFlags(interfaceId, FLAG_DANGLING);
2727  }
2728  }
2729 }
2730 
2738 long PatchKernel::countFreeCells() const
2739 {
2740  double nFreeCells = 0;
2741  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2742  int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
2743  for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
2744  if (cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
2745  ++nFreeCells;
2746  break;
2747  }
2748  }
2749  }
2750 
2751  return nFreeCells;
2752 }
2753 
2762 long PatchKernel::countOrphanCells() const
2763 {
2764  // Compute vertex valence
2765  std::unordered_map<long, short> vertexValence;
2766  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2767  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2768  int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
2769  for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; j++) {
2770  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
2771  vertexValence[vertexId] += 1;
2772  }
2773  }
2774 
2775  // Loop over cells
2776  long nOrphanCells = 0;
2777  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2778  long isIsolated = true;
2779  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2780  int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
2781  for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; j++) {
2782  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
2783  if (vertexValence[vertexId] > 1) {
2784  isIsolated = false;
2785  break;
2786  }
2787  }
2788 
2789  if (isIsolated) {
2790  ++nOrphanCells;
2791  }
2792  }
2793 
2794  return nOrphanCells;
2795 }
2796 
2800 void PatchKernel::updateLastInternalCellId()
2801 {
2802  if (m_nInternalCells == 0) {
2803  m_lastInternalCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
2804  return;
2805  }
2806 
2807  CellIterator lastInternalCellItr;
2808 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2809  if (m_nGhostCells == 0) {
2810  lastInternalCellItr = --m_cells.end();
2811  m_lastInternalCellId = lastInternalCellItr->getId();
2812  } else {
2813  m_lastInternalCellId = m_cells.getSizeMarker(m_nInternalCells - 1, Cell::NULL_ID);
2814  }
2815 #else
2816  lastInternalCellItr = --m_cells.end();
2817  m_lastInternalCellId = lastInternalCellItr->getId();
2818 #endif
2819 }

2905 void PatchKernel::findCellNeighs(long id, int codimension, bool complete, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
2906 {
2907  assert(codimension >= 1 && codimension <= getDimension());
2908 
2909  if (codimension == 1) {
2910  findCellFaceNeighs(id, neighs);
2911  } else if (codimension == getDimension()) {
2912  findCellVertexNeighs(id, complete, neighs);
2913  } else if (codimension == 2) {
2914  findCellEdgeNeighs(id, complete, neighs);
2915  }
2916 }

2924 std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellFaceNeighs(long id) const
2925 {
2926  std::vector<long> neighs;
2927  findCellFaceNeighs(id, &neighs);
2928 
2929  return neighs;
2930 }
2931 
2945 void PatchKernel::_findCellNeighs(long id, const std::vector<long> &blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
2946 {
2947  // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
2948  // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the vertex
2949  // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
2950  int nCellVertices;
2951  if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
2952  ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
2953  const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
2954  nCellVertices = cellTypeInfo.nVertices;
2955  } else {
2956  const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
2957  nCellVertices = cell.getVertexCount();
2958  }
2959 
2960  for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
2961  _findCellVertexNeighs(id, i, blackList, neighs);
2962  }
2963 }
2964 
2974 void PatchKernel::findCellFaceNeighs(long id, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
2975 {
2976  // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
2977  // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the face
2978  // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
2979  int nCellFaces;
2980  if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
2981  ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
2982  const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
2983  nCellFaces = cellTypeInfo.nFaces;
2984  } else {
2985  const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
2986  nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
2987  }
2988 
2989  // Get the neighbours
2990  for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
2991  _findCellFaceNeighs(id, i, std::vector<long>(), neighs);
2992  }
2993 }
2994 
3002 std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellFaceNeighs(long id, int face) const
3003 {
3004  std::vector<long> neighs;
3005  _findCellFaceNeighs(id, face, std::vector<long>(), &neighs);
3006 
3007  return neighs;
3008 }
3009 
3020 void PatchKernel::findCellFaceNeighs(long id, int face, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3021 {
3022  _findCellFaceNeighs(id, face, std::vector<long>(), neighs);
3023 }
3024 
3037 void PatchKernel::_findCellFaceNeighs(long id, int face, const std::vector<long> &blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3038 {
3039  const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3040 
3041  int nFaceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount(face);
3042  const long *faceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies(face);
3043  for (int k = 0; k < nFaceAdjacencies; ++k) {
3044  long neighId = faceAdjacencies[k];
3045  if (utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(neighId, blackList) == blackList.end()) {
3046  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
3047  }
3048  }
3049 }
3050 
3062 std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, bool complete) const
3063 {
3064  std::vector<long> neighs;
3065  findCellEdgeNeighs(id, complete, &neighs);
3066 
3067  return neighs;
3068 }
3069 
3084 void PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, bool complete, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3085 {
3086  assert(isThreeDimensional());
3087  if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
3088  return;
3089  }
3090 
3091  // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3092  // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the edge
3093  // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3094  int nCellEdges;
3095  if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3096  ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3097  const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3098  nCellEdges = cellTypeInfo.nEdges;
3099  } else {
3100  const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3101  nCellEdges = cell.getEdgeCount();
3102  }
3103 
3104  // Get the neighbours
3105  std::vector<long> blackList;
3106  if (!complete) {
3107  findCellFaceNeighs(id, &blackList);
3108  }
3109 
3110  for (int i = 0; i < nCellEdges; ++i) {
3111  _findCellEdgeNeighs(id, i, blackList, neighs);
3112  }
3113 }
3114 
3124 std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge) const
3125 {
3126  std::vector<long> neighs;
3127  findCellEdgeNeighs(id, edge, &neighs);
3128 
3129  return neighs;
3130 }
3131 
3144 void PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3145 {
3146  _findCellEdgeNeighs(id, edge, std::vector<long>(), neighs);
3147 }
3148 
3163 void PatchKernel::_findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge, const std::vector<long> &blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3164 {
3165  assert(isThreeDimensional());
3166  if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
3167  return;
3168  }
3169 
3170  const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3171  ConstProxyVector<int> edgeVertices = cell.getEdgeLocalConnect(edge);
3172  std::size_t nEdgeVertices = edgeVertices.size();
3173  if (nEdgeVertices < 2) {
3174  return;
3175  }
3176 
3177  // Find candidates neighbours
3178  //
3179  // These are the negihbours of the first vertex of the edge.
3180  const int GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT = 3;
3181 
3182  std::vector<long> candidateIds;
3183  candidateIds.reserve(GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT);
3184  _findCellVertexNeighs(id, edgeVertices[0], blackList, &candidateIds);
3185 
3186  // Discard candidates that doesn't contain the last vertex of the edge
3187  long lastEdgeVertexId = cell.getEdgeVertexId(edge, nEdgeVertices - 1);
3188 
3189  ConstProxyVector<long> candidateVertexIds;
3190  for (long candidateId : candidateIds) {
3191  const Cell &candidateNeigh = m_cells.at(candidateId);
3192  candidateVertexIds = candidateNeigh.getVertexIds();
3193  std::size_t nCandidateVertices = candidateVertexIds.size();
3194 
3195  bool isEdgeNeighbour = false;
3196  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < nCandidateVertices; ++k) {
3197  if (candidateVertexIds[k] == lastEdgeVertexId) {
3198  isEdgeNeighbour = true;
3199  break;
3200  }
3201  }
3202 
3203  if (isEdgeNeighbour) {
3204  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(candidateId, *neighs);
3205  }
3206  }
3207 }
3208 
3218 std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, bool complete) const
3219 {
3220  std::vector<long> neighs;
3221  findCellVertexNeighs(id, complete, &neighs);
3222 
3223  return neighs;
3224 }
3225 
3238 void PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, bool complete, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3239 {
3240  // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3241  // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the vertex
3242  // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3243  int nCellVertices;
3244  if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3245  ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3246  const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3247  nCellVertices = cellTypeInfo.nVertices;
3248  } else {
3249  const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3250  nCellVertices = cell.getVertexCount();
3251  }
3252 
3253  // Get the neighbours
3254  std::vector<long> blackList;
3255  if (!complete) {
3256  if (isThreeDimensional()) {
3257  findCellEdgeNeighs(id, true, &blackList);
3258  } else {
3259  findCellFaceNeighs(id, true, &blackList);
3260  }
3261  }
3262 
3263  for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
3264  _findCellVertexNeighs(id, i, blackList, neighs);
3265  }
3266 }
3267 
3275 std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, int vertex) const
3276 {
3277  std::vector<long> neighs;
3278  findCellVertexNeighs(id, vertex, &neighs);
3279 
3280  return neighs;
3281 }
3282 
3293 void PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, int vertex, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3294 {
3295  _findCellVertexNeighs(id, vertex, std::vector<long>(), neighs);
3296 }
3297 
3326 void PatchKernel::_findCellVertexNeighs(long id, int vertex, const std::vector<long> &blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3327 {
3328  const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3329  long vertexId = cell.getVertexId(vertex);
3330 
3331  // Since we are processing a small number of cells it's more efficient to
3332  // store the list of already processed cells in a vector instead of using
3333  // a set or an unordered_set. To speed-up the lookup, the vector is kept
3334  // sorted.
3335  const int GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT = 8;
3336 
3337  std::vector<long> alreadyProcessed;
3338  alreadyProcessed.reserve(GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT);
3339 
3340  std::vector<long> scanQueue;
3341  scanQueue.reserve(GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT);
3342  scanQueue.push_back(id);
3343 
3344  ConstProxyVector<long> scanCellVertexIds;
3345  while (!scanQueue.empty()) {
3346  // Pop a cell to process
3347  long scanCellId = scanQueue.back();
3348  const Cell &scanCell = getCell(scanCellId);
3349  scanQueue.pop_back();
3350  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(scanCell.getId(), alreadyProcessed);
3351 
3352  // Get vertex list
3353  if (scanCell.hasInfo()) {
3354  scanCellVertexIds = scanCell.getVertexIds();
3355  }
3356 
3357  // Use face adjacencies to find vertex negihbours
3358  int nFaces = scanCell.getFaceCount();
3359  for (int i = 0; i < nFaces; ++i) {
3360  // Discard faces with no neighbours
3361  if (scanCell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
3362  continue;
3363  }
3364 
3365  // Discard faces that don't own the vertex
3366  //
3367  // We use differents algorithm depending on whether the cell has a
3368  // reference element or not. If the cell has a reference element,
3369  // accessing the local connectivity of the face is cheap. If the
3370  // cell has no reference element, it is better to avoid using the
3371  // local connectivity of the face.
3372  bool faceOwnsVertex = false;
3373  if (scanCell.hasInfo()) {
3374  ConstProxyVector<int> faceLocalVertexIds = scanCell.getFaceLocalVertexIds(i);
3375  int nFaceVertices = faceLocalVertexIds.size();
3376  for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
3377  long faceVertexId = scanCellVertexIds[faceLocalVertexIds[k]];
3378  if (faceVertexId == vertexId) {
3379  faceOwnsVertex = true;
3380  break;
3381  }
3382  }
3383  } else {
3384  ConstProxyVector<long> faceVertexIds = scanCell.getFaceVertexIds(i);
3385  int nFaceVertices = faceVertexIds.size();
3386  for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
3387  long faceVertexId = faceVertexIds[k];
3388  if (faceVertexId == vertexId) {
3389  faceOwnsVertex = true;
3390  break;
3391  }
3392  }
3393  }
3394 
3395  if (!faceOwnsVertex) {
3396  continue;
3397  }
3398 
3399  // Loop through the adjacencies
3400  //
3401  // Non-manifold patches may have faces with multiple adjacencies.
3402  int nFaceAdjacencies = scanCell.getAdjacencyCount(i);
3403  const long *faceAdjacencies = scanCell.getAdjacencies(i);
3404  for (int k = 0; k < nFaceAdjacencies; ++k) {
3405  long faceNeighId = faceAdjacencies[k];
3406 
3407  // Discard neighbours that have already been processed
3408  if (utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(faceNeighId, alreadyProcessed) != alreadyProcessed.end()) {
3409  continue;
3410  }
3411 
3412  // Update list of vertex neighbours
3413  if (utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(faceNeighId, blackList) == blackList.end()) {
3414  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(faceNeighId, *neighs);
3415  }
3416 
3417  // Update scan list
3418  scanQueue.push_back(faceNeighId);
3419  }
3420  }
3421  }
3422 }
3423 
3431 std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellVertexOneRing(long id, int vertex) const
3432 {
3433  std::vector<long> ring;
3434  findCellVertexOneRing(id, vertex, &ring);
3435 
3436  return ring;
3437 }
3438 
3449 void PatchKernel::findCellVertexOneRing(long id, int vertex, std::vector<long> *ring) const
3450 {
3451  findCellVertexNeighs(id, vertex, ring);
3452  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(id, *ring);
3453 }
3454 
3471 bool PatchKernel::findFaceNeighCell(long cellId, long neighId, int *cellFace, int *cellAdjacencyId) const
3472 {
3473  const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
3474 
3475  int nFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3476  for (int i = 0; i < nFaces; ++i) {
3477  int nFaceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount(i);
3478  const long *faceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies(i);
3479  for (int k = 0; k < nFaceAdjacencies; ++k) {
3480  long faceNeighId = faceAdjacencies[k];
3481  if (faceNeighId < 0) {
3482  continue;
3483  } else if (faceNeighId == neighId) {
3484  *cellFace = i;
3485  *cellAdjacencyId = k;
3486  return true;
3487  }
3488  }
3489  }
3490 
3491  *cellFace = -1;
3492  *cellAdjacencyId = -1;
3493 
3494  return false;
3495 }

3506  for (CellConstIterator itr = internalCellConstBegin(); itr != endItr; ++itr) {
3507  list.insert(itr->getPID());
3508  }
3509 
3510  return list;
3511 }

3524  if (itr->getPID() == pid){
3525  cells.push_back(itr.getId());
3526  }

3528

3547 
3558 void PatchKernel::findVertexOneRing(long vertexId, std::vector<long> *ring) const
3559 {
3560  // Find local id of the vertex
3561  //
3562  // Coincident vertices with different ids are not supported, this case is
3563  // special because a cell may contain a point with the vertex coordinates,
3564  // but may not contain the requested vertex (because it contains one of
3565  // the other coincident vertices).
3566  const std::array<double, 3> &coords = getVertexCoords(vertexId);
3567  long cellId = locatePoint(coords);
3568  if (cellId == bitpit::Element::NULL_ID) {
3569  return;
3570  }
3571 
3572  int vertexLocalId = getCell(cellId).findVertex(vertexId);
3573  assert(vertexLocalId >= 0);
3574 
3575  // Find vertex one-ring
3576  findCellVertexOneRing(cellId, vertexLocalId, ring);
3577 }

3740 PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(Interface &&source, long id)
3741 {
3742  if (id < 0) {
3743  id = source.getId();
3744  }
3745 
3746  int connectSize = source.getConnectSize();
3747  std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
3748 
3749  InterfaceIterator iterator = addInterface(source.getType(), std::move(connectStorage), id);
3750 
3751  Interface &interface = (*iterator);
3752  id = interface.getId();
3753  interface = std::move(source);
3754  interface.setId(id);
3755 
3756  return iterator;
3757 }

3777  std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
3778 
3779  return addInterface(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
3780 }

3797 PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(ElementType type,
3798  const std::vector<long> &connectivity,
3799  long id)
3800 {
3801  int connectSize = connectivity.size();
3802  std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
3803  std::copy(connectivity.data(), connectivity.data() + connectSize, connectStorage.get());
3804 
3805  return addInterface(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
3806 }
3807 
3824 PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(ElementType type,
3825  std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
3826  long id)
3827 {
3828  if (!isExpert()) {
3829  return interfaceEnd();
3830  }
3831 
3832  if (id < 0) {
3833  id = m_interfaceIdGenerator.generate();
3834  } else {
3835  m_interfaceIdGenerator.setAssigned(id);
3836  }
3837 
3838  if (Interface::getDimension(type) > (getDimension() - 1)) {
3839  return interfaceEnd();
3840  }
3841 
3842  PiercedVector<Interface>::iterator iterator = m_interfaces.emreclaim(id, id, type, std::move(connectStorage));
3843 
3844  // Set the alteration flags
3845  setAddedInterfaceAlterationFlags(id);
3846 
3847  return iterator;
3848 }
3849 
3858 void PatchKernel::setAddedInterfaceAlterationFlags(long id)
3859 {
3860  BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
3861 }
3862 
3875 PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::restoreInterface(ElementType type,
3876  std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
3877  long id)
3878 {
3879  if (!isExpert()) {
3880  return interfaceEnd();
3881  }
3882 
3883  if (Interface::getDimension(type) > (getDimension() - 1)) {
3884  return interfaceEnd();
3885  }
3886 
3887  InterfaceIterator iterator = m_interfaces.find(id);
3888  if (iterator == m_interfaces.end()) {
3889  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore the specified interface: the kernel doesn't contain an entry for that interface.");
3890  }
3891 
3892  // There is not need to set the id of the interfaces as assigned, because
3893  // also the index generator will be restored.
3894  Interface &interface = *iterator;
3895  interface.initialize(id, type, std::move(connectStorage));
3896 
3897  // Set the alteration flags
3898  setRestoredInterfaceAlterationFlags(id);
3899 
3900  return iterator;
3901 }

3909 {
3910  BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
3911 }
3912 
3918 bool PatchKernel::deleteInterface(long id)
3919 {
3920  if (!isExpert()) {
3921  return false;
3922  }
3923 
3924  // Set the alteration flags
3925  setDeletedInterfaceAlterationFlags(id);
3926 
3927  // Delete interface
3928  m_interfaces.erase(id, true);
3929  m_interfaceIdGenerator.trash(id);
3930 
3931  return true;
3932 }
3933 
3939 bool PatchKernel::deleteInterfaces(const std::vector<long> &ids)
3940 {
3941  if (!isExpert()) {
3942  return false;
3943  }
3944 
3945  // Deleting the last interface requires some additional work. If the ids
3946  // of interfaces to be deleted contain the last interface, that interface
3947  // is deleted after deleting all other interfaces. In this way we make
3948  // sure to delete the last interface just once (after deleting the last
3949  // interface, another interface becomes the last one and that interface
3950  // may be on the deletion list as well, and on and so forth).
3951  std::size_t lastId;
3952  if (!m_interfaces.empty()) {
3953  lastId = m_interfaces.back().getId();
3954  } else {
3955  lastId = Interface::NULL_ID;
3956  }
3957 
3958  bool deleteLast = false;
3959  std::vector<long>::const_iterator end = ids.cend();
3960  for (std::vector<long>::const_iterator i = ids.cbegin(); i != end; ++i) {
3961  std::size_t interfaceId = *i;
3962  if (interfaceId == lastId) {
3963  deleteLast = true;
3964  continue;
3965  }
3966 
3967  deleteInterface(interfaceId);
3968  }
3969 
3970  if (deleteLast) {
3971  deleteInterface(lastId);
3972  }
3973 
3974  return true;
3975 }
3976 
3984 void PatchKernel::setDeletedInterfaceAlterationFlags(long id)
3985 {
3986  resetInterfaceAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_DELETED);
3987 }
3988

3999  for (const Interface &interface : m_interfaces) {
4000  if (interface.getNeigh() < 0) {
4001  ++nFreeInterfaces;
4002  }
4003  }
4004 
4005  return nFreeInterfaces;
4006 }

4016 long PatchKernel::countOrphanInterfaces() const

4020  const long interfaceId = itr.getId();
4021  if (isInterfaceOrphan(interfaceId)) {
4022  ++nOrphanInterfaces;
4023  }

4056  return false;

4064 
4073 bool PatchKernel::isInterfaceOrphan(long id) const
4074 {
4075  const Interface &interface = getInterface(id);
4076 
4077  // Interface is not orphan if it has an owner or a neighbour
4078  long ownerId = interface.getOwner();
4079  long neighId = interface.getNeigh();
4080  if (ownerId >= 0 && neighId >= 0) {
4081  return false;
4082  }
4083 
4084  // Interface is not orphan if it's on a border face of an internal cell
4085  if (ownerId >= 0 && neighId < 0) {
4086  const Cell &owner = getCell(ownerId);
4087  if (owner.isInterior()) {
4088  return false;
4089  }
4090  }
4091 
4092  return true;
4093 }
4094 
4100 long PatchKernel::countFaces() const
4101 {
4102  double nFaces = 0;
4103  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
4104  int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
4105  for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
4106  if (!cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
4107  nFaces += 1. / (cell.getAdjacencyCount(i) + 1);
4108  } else {
4109  nFaces += 1.;
4110  }
4111  }
4112  }
4113 
4114  return ((long) round(nFaces));
4115 }
4116 
4124 long PatchKernel::countFreeFaces() const
4125 {
4126  double nFreeFaces = 0;
4127  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
4128  int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
4129  for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
4130  if (cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
4131  ++nFreeFaces;
4132  }
4133  }
4134  }
4135 
4136  return nFreeFaces;
4137 }

4144 void PatchKernel::dumpVertices(std::ostream &stream) const
4145 {
4146  // Dump kernel
4147  m_vertices.dumpKernel(stream);
4148 
4149  // Dump vertices
4150  for (const Vertex &vertex : m_vertices) {
4151  utils::binary::write(stream, vertex.getId());
4152 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4153  utils::binary::write(stream, getVertexRank(vertex.getId()));
4154 #else
4155  int dummyRank = 0;
4156  utils::binary::write(stream, dummyRank);
4157 #endif
4158 
4159  const std::array<double, 3> &coords = vertex.getCoords();
4160  utils::binary::write(stream, coords[0]);
4161  utils::binary::write(stream, coords[1]);
4162  utils::binary::write(stream, coords[2]);
4163  }
4164 
4165  // Dump ghost/internal subdivision
4166 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4167  utils::binary::write(stream, m_firstGhostVertexId);
4168  utils::binary::write(stream, m_lastInternalVertexId);
4169 #else
4170  utils::binary::write(stream, Vertex::NULL_ID);
4171  utils::binary::write(stream, Vertex::NULL_ID);
4172 #endif
4173 }
4174 
4180 void PatchKernel::restoreVertices(std::istream &stream)
4181 {
4182  // Restore kernel
4183  m_vertices.restoreKernel(stream);
4184 
4185  // Enable advanced editing
4186  bool originalExpertStatus = isExpert();
4187  setExpert(true);
4188 
4189  // Restore vertices
4190  long nVertices = m_vertices.size();
4191  for (long i = 0; i < nVertices; ++i) {
4192  long id;
4193  utils::binary::read(stream, id);
4194 
4195 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4196  int rank;
4197  utils::binary::read(stream, rank);
4198 #else
4199  int dummyRank;
4200  utils::binary::read(stream, dummyRank);
4201 #endif
4202 
4203  std::array<double, 3> coords;
4204  utils::binary::read(stream, coords[0]);
4205  utils::binary::read(stream, coords[1]);
4206  utils::binary::read(stream, coords[2]);
4207 
4208 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4209  restoreVertex(std::move(coords), rank, id);
4210 #else
4211  restoreVertex(std::move(coords), id);
4212 #endif
4213  }
4214 
4215  // Restore ghost/internal subdivision
4216 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4217  utils::binary::read(stream, m_firstGhostVertexId);
4218  utils::binary::read(stream, m_lastInternalVertexId);
4219 #else
4220  long dummyFirstGhostVertexId;
4221  long dummyLastInternalVertexId;
4222  utils::binary::read(stream, dummyFirstGhostVertexId);
4223  utils::binary::read(stream, dummyLastInternalVertexId);
4224 #endif
4225 
4226  // Set original advanced editing status
4227  setExpert(originalExpertStatus);
4228 }
4229 
4235 void PatchKernel::dumpCells(std::ostream &stream) const
4236 {
4237  // Dump kernel
4238  m_cells.dumpKernel(stream);
4239 
4240  // Dump cells
4241  for (const Cell &cell: m_cells) {
4242  utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getId());
4243  utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getPID());
4244  utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getType());
4245 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4246  utils::binary::write(stream, getCellRank(cell.getId()));
4247 #else
4248  int dummyRank = 0;
4249  utils::binary::write(stream, dummyRank);
4250 #endif
4251 
4252  int cellConnectSize = cell.getConnectSize();
4253  utils::binary::write(stream, cellConnectSize);
4254 
4255  const long *cellConnect = cell.getConnect();
4256  for (int i = 0; i < cellConnectSize; ++i) {
4257  utils::binary::write(stream, cellConnect[i]);
4258  }
4259  }
4260 
4261  // Dump ghost/internal subdivision
4262 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4263  utils::binary::write(stream, m_firstGhostCellId);
4264  utils::binary::write(stream, m_lastInternalCellId);
4265 #else
4266  utils::binary::write(stream, Cell::NULL_ID);
4267  utils::binary::write(stream, Cell::NULL_ID);
4268 #endif
4269 }
4270 
4276 void PatchKernel::restoreCells(std::istream &stream)
4277 {
4278  // Restore kernel
4279  m_cells.restoreKernel(stream);
4280 
4281  // Enable advanced editing
4282  bool originalExpertStatus = isExpert();
4283  setExpert(true);
4284 
4285  // Restore cells
4286  long nCells = m_cells.size();
4287  for (long i = 0; i < nCells; ++i) {
4288  long id;
4289  utils::binary::read(stream, id);
4290 
4291  int PID;
4292  utils::binary::read(stream, PID);
4293 
4294  ElementType type;
4295  utils::binary::read(stream, type);
4296 
4297 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4298  int rank;
4299  utils::binary::read(stream, rank);
4300 #else
4301  int dummyRank;
4302  utils::binary::read(stream, dummyRank);
4303 #endif
4304 
4305  int cellConnectSize;
4306  utils::binary::read(stream, cellConnectSize);
4307 
4308  std::unique_ptr<long[]> cellConnect = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[cellConnectSize]);
4309  for (int k = 0; k < cellConnectSize; ++k) {
4310  utils::binary::read(stream, cellConnect[k]);
4311  }
4312 
4313  CellIterator iterator;
4314 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4315  iterator = restoreCell(type, std::move(cellConnect), rank, id);
4316 #else
4317  iterator = restoreCell(type, std::move(cellConnect), id);
4318 #endif
4319  iterator->setPID(PID);
4320  }
4321 
4322  // Restore ghost/internal subdivision
4323 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4324  utils::binary::read(stream, m_firstGhostCellId);
4325  utils::binary::read(stream, m_lastInternalCellId);
4326 #else
4327  long dummyFirstGhostCellId;
4328  long dummyLastInternalCellId;
4329  utils::binary::read(stream, dummyFirstGhostCellId);
4330  utils::binary::read(stream, dummyLastInternalCellId);
4331 #endif
4332 
4333  // Update adjacencies
4334  updateAdjacencies();
4335 
4336  // Set original advanced editing status
4337  setExpert(originalExpertStatus);
4338 }
4339 
4345 void PatchKernel::dumpInterfaces(std::ostream &stream) const
4346 {
4347  // Early return if the interfaces are not build
4348  if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_NONE) {
4349  return;
4350  }
4351 
4352  // Dump kernel
4353  m_interfaces.dumpKernel(stream);
4354 
4355  // Dump interfaces
4356  for (const Interface &interface : getInterfaces()) {
4357  utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getId());
4358 
4359  utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getOwner());
4360  utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getOwnerFace());
4361 
4362  long neighId = interface.getNeigh();
4363  utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getNeigh());
4364  if (neighId >= 0) {
4365  utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getNeighFace());
4366  }
4367 
4368  utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getPID());
4369  }
4370 }
4371 
4377 void PatchKernel::restoreInterfaces(std::istream &stream)
4378 {
4379  // Early return if the interfaces are not build
4380  if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_NONE) {
4381  return;
4382  }
4383 
4384  // Interfaces need up-to-date adjacencies
4385  updateAdjacencies();
4386 
4387  // Restore kernel
4388  m_interfaces.restoreKernel(stream);
4389 
4390  // Enable advanced editing
4391  bool originalExpertStatus = isExpert();
4392  setExpert(true);
4393 
4394  // Restore interfaces
4395  long nInterfaces = m_interfaces.size();
4396  for (long n = 0; n < nInterfaces; ++n) {
4397  long interfaceId;
4398  utils::binary::read(stream, interfaceId);
4399 
4400  long ownerId;
4401  int ownerFace;
4402  utils::binary::read(stream, ownerId);
4403  utils::binary::read(stream, ownerFace);
4404  Cell *owner = &(m_cells.at(ownerId));
4405 
4406  long neighId;
4407  int neighFace;
4408  utils::binary::read(stream, neighId);
4409  Cell *neigh;
4410  if (neighId >= 0) {
4411  utils::binary::read(stream, neighFace);
4412  neigh = &(m_cells.at(neighId));
4413  } else {
4414  neighFace = -1;
4415  neigh = nullptr;
4416  }
4417 
4418  int pid;
4419  utils::binary::read(stream, pid);
4420 
4421  InterfaceIterator interfaceIterator = buildCellInterface(owner, ownerFace, neigh, neighFace, interfaceId);
4422  interfaceIterator->setPID(pid);
4423  }
4424 
4425  // Interfaces are now updated
4426  unsetCellAlterationFlags(FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
4427  m_alteredInterfaces.clear();
4428 
4429  // Set original advanced editing status
4430  setExpert(originalExpertStatus);
4431 }

4578 bool PatchKernel::sortVertices()
4579 {
4580  if (!isExpert()) {
4581  return false;
4582  }
4583 
4584  // Sort internal vertices
4585  if (m_nInternalVertices > 0) {
4586  m_vertices.sortBefore(m_lastInternalVertexId, true);
4587  updateLastInternalVertexId();
4588  }
4589 
4590 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4591  // Sort ghost cells
4592  if (m_nGhostVertices > 0) {
4593  m_vertices.sortAfter(m_firstGhostVertexId, true);
4594  updateFirstGhostVertexId();
4595  }
4596 #endif
4597 
4598  // Synchronize storage
4599  m_vertices.sync();
4600 
4601  return true;
4602 }
4603 
4609 bool PatchKernel::sortCells()
4610 {
4611  if (!isExpert()) {
4612  return false;
4613  }
4614 
4615  // Sort internal cells
4616  if (m_nInternalCells > 0) {
4617  m_cells.sortBefore(m_lastInternalCellId, true);
4618  updateLastInternalCellId();
4619  }
4620 
4621 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4622  // Sort ghost cells
4623  if (m_nGhostCells > 0) {
4624  m_cells.sortAfter(m_firstGhostCellId, true);
4625  updateFirstGhostCellId();
4626  }
4627 #endif
4628 
4629  // Synchronize storage
4630  m_cells.sync();
4631 
4632  return true;
4633 }

4641  return false;
4642  }

4644  m_interfaces.sort();

4655 bool PatchKernel::sort()

4658  status |= sortCells();
4659  status |= sortInterfaces();
4660 
4661  return status;
4662 }
